dashboard.status.connected: Your broker connection is active and validated.
dashboard.status.disconnected: No active broker session. Trading is disabled.
dashboard.risk.heatmap: Visual representation of your current P&L vs. Daily Risk Limit.
dashboard.risk.daily_loss: Hard limit. Trading halts immediately if this daily loss is exceeded.
dashboard.risk.max_position: Maximum number of lots allowed per single order.
dashboard.risk.trailing_sl: Dynamic stop-loss that follows price movement by this percentage.
automation.launch.master_switch: Main control to engage or disengage all algorithmic execution.
automation.launch.live_warning: You are in LIVE mode. Real orders will be placed on the exchange.
automation.checklist.broker: Verifies that a valid broker adapter is connected.
automation.checklist.session: Checks if the current access token is valid and not expired.
automation.checklist.risk: Ensures a risk profile is selected to govern trade sizing.
automation.checklist.limits: Verifies that a daily loss limit is explicitly defined.
automation.panic_stop: EMERGENCY: Instantly halts all logic and reverts to Sandbox mode.
os.health.kernel: Connection Health to the Aegis Execution Kernel (Port 8080).
telegram.control.broadcast: Master switch for signal broadcasting to public channels.
telegram.control.channels: List of active Telegram channels receiving signals.
saas.plans: Your current subscription tier that determines trade limits and feature access.
saas.quota: Remaining daily budget for live executions and signal signals.
saas.paper: Simulated trading environment. No real funds are at risk.
saas.compliance: Regulatory controls enforced by the Core Execution OS.
